name: RoleMasterD100
description: RoleMaster D100 Generator is a configurable script for generating d100 rolls according to RoleMaster explosion rules. Rolls can be high open-ended, low open-ended, open-ended in both directions (the default), with the option to allow multiple change of directions (see Help by sending the following command through chat: !rmd100 --help). Use the Config panel to set script-level parameters, or command line arguments to apply settings to a single roll. This script is set up to work as a metascript, feeding the resulting roll into another script's command line, if you need it. More details are in the Help panel.For more information, see the original thread in the API forum:[RoleMasterD100 Forum Thread](https://app.roll20.net/forum/permalink/10917965/)
